DOC.brief_summary: To provide local data on efficacy and safety of insulin glulisine in patients with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus receiving insulin glargine as basic insulin therapy
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus, Type 1 HbA1c 6.511.0% BMI <35 kg/mÂ² Diabetes mellitus, Type 2 The above information is not intended to contain all considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
